item.title: mesos
item.description: 1. What is Mesos and why would you use it? It lets you setup and manage a cluster of machines “easily” (when you know how to use it, which is not very straightforward). combined with Marathon it provides you with a nice interface to setup and manage docker containers and even build a whole system based on a microservice architecture. 2.
